institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) operating rules/Article 9 (Selection of ISC)
contents: Article 9 (Selection of ISC) ① The Corporation selects ISCs through public contest, etc., and the selection is confirmed in the order of review and resolution by the Deliberation Committee. Presentation screening can be conducted concurrently with the screening, and the deliberation committee confirms the selection of the ISC from among the institutions that have passed the screening. ② Details regarding the holding of the deliberation committee for the selection of the ISC shall follow a separate plan of the responsible department of the Corporation.
